title: Sainz: Live to Compete
overview: Carlos Sainz has turned 59 years old. While rivals of his generation have already hung up the helmet, he continues at the highest level, year after year. His story is an example of perseverance. Two-time world rally champion and three-time Dakar winner, his ambition knows no bounds. We live with him the most hectic year of his, which has also meant the debut of his son, Carlos, as a Ferrari driver.
